title: Tutorials
description: Step-by-step tutorials to help you master Plugged.in features - from basic MCP server setup to advanced RAG integration and custom development.

search.placeholder: Search tutorials by keyword or tag...
search.noResults: No tutorials found matching your search

first-mcp-server.title: Your First MCP Server
first-mcp-server.description: Learn how to set up and configure your first MCP server. Perfect for beginners to understand the basics of the Model Context Protocol.

sharing-with-community.title: Sharing with the Community
sharing-with-community.description: Discover how to share your MCP servers and collections with the Plugged.in community. Build your reputation and help others.

rag-knowledge-base.title: Building a RAG Knowledge Base
rag-knowledge-base.description: Create a powerful knowledge base by uploading documents and enabling AI to query your information using RAG technology.

using-rag-in-client.title: Using RAG in Your MCP Client
using-rag-in-client.description: Learn how to query your RAG knowledge base directly from Claude, Cursor, or any MCP client using the pluggedin_rag_query tool.

notifications-system.title: Sending Notifications from AI
notifications-system.description: Set up automated notifications from your AI assistant. Learn to use pluggedin_send_notification for alerts and updates.

team-collaboration.title: Team Collaboration Setup
team-collaboration.description: Configure workspaces for your team, manage profiles, and share private collections for seamless collaboration.

custom-mcp-server.title: Creating Custom MCP Servers
custom-mcp-server.description: Dive deep into MCP protocol and build your own custom servers using TypeScript or Python. Includes publishing to npm.

api-integration.title: API Integration Guide
api-integration.description: Master the Plugged.in REST API for building external integrations, automation, and custom applications.

self-hosting.title: Self-Hosting Plugged.in
self-hosting.description: Complete guide to deploying your own Plugged.in instance using Docker, including database setup and configuration.

security-best-practices.title: Security Best Practices
security-best-practices.description: Learn about encryption features, API key management, sandboxing, and other security configurations to protect your data.

ragAndNotifications.title: RAG + Notifications Workflow
ragAndNotifications.description: Master the powerful combination of knowledge queries and automated notifications

security.title: Security & Deployment
security.description: Secure your instance and deploy with confidence
